doc_context:
path /v3/offchain/withdrawal
opid storewithdrawal
params None
sum store withdrawal
reqBody
schema withdrawal
props
senderaccountid
desc sender account id
maxlength 24
minlength 24
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets to for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain addresses as a comma separated string
maxlength 10000
minlength 1
type string
amount
desc amount to be withdrawn to blockchain
maxlength 38
type string
pattern ddd
attr
desc used to parametrize withdrawal used for xrp withdrawal to define destination tag of recipient or xlm memo of the recipient if needed
for bitcoin litecoin bitcoin cash used as a change address for left coins from transaction
maxlength 64
minlength 1
type string
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
fee
desc fee to be submitted as a transaction fee to blockchain
type string
pattern ddd
multipleamounts
desc for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain amounts list of recipient addresses must be present in the address field and total sum of amounts must be equal to the amount field
type array
items
type string
pattern ddd
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
maxlength 500
minlength 1
type string
required
amount
senderaccountid
address
fee
type object

enum

schema

maximum 50

schema

in path
name id

sum cancel withdrawal
path /v3/offchain/withdrawal/broadcast
opid broadcastblockchaintransaction
params None
sum broadcast signed transaction and complete withdrawal
reqBody
schema broadcastwithdrawal
props
currency
desc currency of signed transaction to be broadcast btc ltc doge bnb xlm trx bch eth xrp erc20 trc20
maxlength 40
minlength 2
type string
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
withdrawalid
desc withdrawal id to be completed by transaction broadcast
maxlength 24
minlength 24
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign this is should be stored on a client side to retrieve id of the blockchain transaction when signing application signs the transaction and broadcasts it to the blockchain
format uuid
type string
required
txdata
currency
type object
